'''Sturdy Pine Fence''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Sturdy Pine Fence is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 12h
|Pine Wood = 4
|sort = Pine Wood
}}
